com.redhat.rhn.common.util

Class SHA256Crypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.util.SHA256Crypt

  • public class SHA256Crypt
extends java.lang.Object
    SHA256Crypt Utility class to create/check SHA256 passwords Passwords are in the format of $1$salt$encodedpassword.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String crypt(java.lang.String key)
      crypt - method to help in setting passwords.
      static java.lang.String crypt(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String s)
      crypt Encodes a key using a salt (s) in the same manner as the perl crypt() function
      static java.lang.String sha256Hex(byte[] secretBytes)
      SHA256 and Hexify an array of bytes.

    • Method Detail

      • crypt

        public static java.lang.String crypt(java.lang.String key)
        crypt - method to help in setting passwords.
        Parameters:
        key - - The key to encode
        Returns:
        Returns a string in the form of "$1$RandomSalt$encodedkey"

      • crypt

        public static java.lang.String crypt(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.String s)
        crypt Encodes a key using a salt (s) in the same manner as the perl crypt() function
        Parameters:
        key - - The key to encode
        s - - The salt
        Returns:
        Returns a string in the form of "$1$salt$encodedkey"
        Throws:
        SHA256CryptException

      • sha256Hex

        public static java.lang.String sha256Hex(java.lang.String inputString)
        SHA256 and Hexify a string. Take the input string, SHA256 encode it and then turn it into Hex.
        Parameters:
        inputString - you want SHA256hexed
        Returns:
        sha256hexed String.

      • sha256Hex

        public static java.lang.String sha256Hex(byte[] secretBytes)
        SHA256 and Hexify an array of bytes. Take the input array, SHA256 encodes it and then turns it into Hex.
        Parameters:
        secretBytes - you want sha256hexed
        Returns:
        sha256hexed String.
